translation.from: You have successfully connected to Facebook.
translation.to: You have successfully connected to Facebook.
誕生日：今日%firstname%が%age%になりました。おめでとう!
It appears that the Facebook authentication did not finish. The Facebook plugin requires that you authenticate with the Facebook servers before it can continue.
Facebook Chat: Couldn't log in! If you made sure that your login credentials are correct, Facebook may have changed something that causes Chat functionality to stop working for now.
A browser should have opened to provide your Facebook login information. Please click here when you are done logging into Facebook!
A browser should have opened to authorize Trillian to access your Facebook data. Please click here when you granted permission!

Launching log in page. If a web page does not appear, you can %clickherelink% to open up another page to try again. Note that this link won't work if you have already opened the page. In this case, use the right-click menu to try again.
Launching permissions request page. If a web page does not appear, you can %clickherelink% to open up another page to try again.
You have not authorized the Trillian Facebook Application to post status updates, comments or add likes. Please click here to do that now.
You were invited to join the %name% event.
You were invited to join %name% and %othercount% other event(s).
%name% has sent you a friend request!
You have new friend requests (from %name% and %othercount% others)!
You were invited to join the %name% group.
You were invited to join %name% and %othercount% other group(s).
You have not authorized the Trillian Facebook Application to post status updates yet!
The Facebook server closed the connection without sending a valid response. This may be a network error or a problem that the Facebook platform is experiencing currently. Try again later.
The Facebook servers failed to supply us with required information. Please retry.
Facebook social network integration. Contact alerts, news feeds and more!
You need to give the requested permissions to the Trillian application before Trillian can connect.
Your Facebook login session has expired. Please click here to re-login!
Error validating the session during update request for %method% (#%attempt%). Trying again in %secs% seconds.
